qas.question: What was the first season of American Idol to feature online auditions?
What website hosted auditions for American Idols tenth season?
How did Karen Rodriguez audition for American Idol season ten?
This is the first season to have what kind of auditions?
Where could contestants submit a video audition?

context: <a0_0>Season ten<a0_0/> is the first to include <a3_0>online<a3_0/> auditions where contestants could submit a 40-second video audition via <a1_0><a2_0><a4_0>Myspace<a4_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/>. Karen Rodriguez was one such auditioner and reached the final rounds.
